item.title: Vulnerability Data Enrichment for CVE Records: 256 CNAs on the Enrichment Recognition List for February 2, 2026
item.description: Vulnerability Data Enrichment for CVE Records: 256 CNAs on the Enrichment Recognition List for February 2, 2026blogBy CVE Program|February 3, 2026

item.title: CODRA Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: CODRA Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsFebruary 3, 2026CODRAis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for CODRA’s products and related services.

item.title: Minutes from CVE Board Teleconference Meeting on January 7 Now Available
item.description: Minutes from CVE Board Teleconference Meeting on January 7 Now AvailablenewsFebruary 10, 2026TheCVE Boardheld a teleconference meeting on January 7, 2026. Read themeeting minutes summary.

item.title: Project Black Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: Project Black Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsFebruary 10, 2026Project Blackis now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for vulnerabilities discovered by Project Black that are not within another CNA’s scope.

item.title: NOTICE: Date/Time Normalization Maintenance of Historical CVE Records to Occur February 16–26 (UPDATED: February 17, 2026)
item.description: NOTICE: Date/Time Normalization Maintenance of Historical CVE Records to Occur February 16–26 (UPDATED: February 17, 2026)blogBy CVE Program|February 10, 2026TheCVE™ Programwill normalize the formatting of date/time fields across historicalCVE Recordsfrom February 16, 2026, through February 26, 2026. Asinitially announced on January 6, 2026, this maintenance will update older CVE Records so their date/time values use the same standardized ISO 8601 UTC format already in place for records published or updated since February 2025:yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.sssZ (ISO-8601, UTC)For example:2025-07-11T19:32:03.983ZNOTE: This article was revised on February 17, 2026, to add an additional day of processing to this CVE List maintenance schedule to address potential inconsistencies identified during the first day, February 16, 2026.

item.title: MegaZone Reelected as CNA Liaison Board Member
item.description: MegaZone Reelected as CNA Liaison Board MembernewsFebruary 17, 2026TheCVE Programis pleased to announce that MegaZone ofF5, Inc., received the majority of votes from CNAs and was reelected as theCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)Liaison to theCVE Boardfor another one-year term.

item.title: DTEX Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: DTEX Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsFebruary 17, 2026DTEX Systems, Inc.is now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for all DTEX products, including DTEX Forwarder for Mac, DTEX Forwarder for Linux, DTEX Forwarder for Windows, and DTEX platform including DTEX Analytics Server.

item.title: Vestel Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: Vestel Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsFebruary 17, 2026Vestel Electronics Industry & Trade Co.is now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for Vestel-owned brands and products only.

item.title: JupiterOne Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)
item.description: JupiterOne Added as CVE Numbering Authority (CNA)newsFebruary 24, 2026JupiterOne, Inc.is now aCVE Numbering Authority (CNA)for all JupiterOne open source and commercial products.
